body_html:
Hi peterjc123,
I just cloned yesterday pythorch to be able to use caffe2. I followed the instructions from https://caffe2.ai/docs/getting-started.html?platform=windows&configuration=compile
but installing CUDA 9.2

So, I install it running build_windows.bat on my own machine.

Do I need to do what you suggested before for this case?

Hi peterjc123,
I just cloned yesterday pythorch to be able to use caffe2. I followed the instructions from https://caffe2.ai/docs/getting-started.html?platform=windows&configuration=compile
